thread.title: Brett
thread.title_full: Traffic School 4 Busy People reviewed by Brett

author: Brett
title: Brett
text: I found the whole traffic school experience a lot less stressful than I thought it was going to be. I anticipated it being a long, painful, and tedious process, but it was far from it. It was easy to follow, interesting (to the extent that traffic school can be), and I finished the entire course very quickly. I had dedicated the entire day to do it, but I finished the entire course in a few hours, which included a number of breaks, and I moved at a very leisurely pace. Needless to say, I was pleasantly surprised. What's more, I did not have to submit proof of completion to the court. Traffic School 4 Busy People did all of that for me.
